snippet.title: Patch Tarot 3 is DONE!
snippet.description:
Order your Patch Tarot 3 deck right here - your pre-order will help bring this project to life! - https://patchtarot.com/3 

Patch Tarot is a profound and innovative reimagining of traditional tarot, blending ancient wisdom, spiritual teachings, and modern metaphysical insights to offer a powerful tool for personal transformation. Based on core symbols and ideas from the Thoth Tarot and the Rider Waite decks, Patch Tarot enhances these archetypes with modern, insightful interpretations, inviting seekers into a deeply immersive and expansive journey through consciousness.

The deck itself contains 88 cards, each carrying layers of spiritual depth, symbolism, and meaning. Every card in Patch Tarot weaves a vibrant tapestry of esoteric knowledge, depicting key aspects of human experience and cosmic principles. These cards provide a unique and comprehensive roadmap for navigating the internal and external worlds, empowering users to explore their spiritual paths and align with higher truths.

At the core of Patch Tarot‚Äôs power lies its connection to the Ascended Tree of Life, a sacred symbol representing the structure of the universe and the interconnectedness of all things. This tree transcends the traditional Sephiroth by encompassing a deeper, more expanded model of spiritual evolution. Each card in the Patch Tarot aligns with different paths and spheres on this tree, mapping the journey of the soul‚Äôs ascension and its relationship to the Divine. The Ascended Tree of Life serves as a framework for transformation, integrating elements of Kabbalah, alchemy, astrology, and sacred geometry into a cohesive system of spiritual growth.

The imagery in Patch Tarot not only references the Tree of Life but also incorporates energetic elements from the four classical elements (Fire, Water, Air, Earth), blending with modern concepts of consciousness and spirituality to create a holistic view of existence. These cards reflect the inner balance of masculine and feminine energies, the dynamic play of the material and spiritual realms, and the evolution of consciousness that is central to the human experience.

Ultimately, Patch Tarot is not just a deck of cards but a living, breathing spiritual tool. Through its profound connection to the Ascended Tree of Life, it serves as a guide for awakening, growth, and transformation, inviting every user to explore their highest potential and understand their place in the cosmic journey.

snippet.title: Healing with Ayurveda: A Comprehensive Guide
snippet.description:
Today, humanity faces an unprecedented level of pain, trauma, and anxiety that is taking its toll on our emotional well-being. This video aims to support each in creating inner stability from which to live by. Watch the full series on Gaia: https://bit.ly/patchman_thrive

We are honored today to partner with @GaiaVideo to bring you this special episode exploring the practice of Ayurveda and its holistic approach to healing. Ayurveda, which means "the knowledge of life," is a 5000-year-old holistic medical system that originated in India. It's often known as the sister science to yoga and is one of the world's oldest and most comprehensive medical systems. Unlike anything seen before on Gaia, Thrive: Self-Healing with Ayurveda is a multi-part educational experience that offers a range of ways to explore, including a docuseries, cooking shows, self-care tutorials, yoga classes, and meditations.

Through this series, learn how to bring balance to your mind, body, emotions, and spirit, and come into deeper connection with your unique body type. You'll also understand your imbalances and learn techniques to restore greater harmony to your system. By practicing Ayurveda, one becomes able to more easily navigate challenging circumstances and fundamentally change the way you live in the world.

snippet.title: The Urgent Need to Purify Our Energetic Fields
snippet.description:
It doesn't take much to purify ones body of consciousness! Learn how in the Four Elements Transformation: https://www.spiritverse.academy/four-elements-transformation

The world is a complex and interconnected web of energy that is constantly in flux. At the heart of this energy lies our collective consciousness, an energetic field that contains within it the thoughts and actions of every person on the planet. Unfortunately, our collective consciousness is polluted with negative thoughts, emotions, and behaviors, leading to a cycle of toxicity that can be difficult to break free from.

As we navigate the complexities of modern life, it's easy to fall victim to the negative energy that surrounds us. We may find ourselves dwelling on our own problems, feeling angry or frustrated at the world, or struggling with feelings of anxiety or depression. In these moments, it's important to remember that we are not alone - our thoughts and emotions are part of a larger, interconnected web of energy that is constantly influencing the state and quality of our reality.

The good news is that we can take steps to protect ourselves from the negative energy that is so prevalent in our world. By cultivating positive thoughts, emotions, and behaviors, we can help to purify the collective consciousness and create a healthier, more positive world for ourselves and those around us. Whether through mindfulness practices, self-reflection, or acts of kindness and generosity, we each have the power to make a difference in the world and help to heal the collective consciousness. 

The Four Elements transformation has been designed to assist in doing just that. Click Here to learn more and sign up, and you will be amazed by the results: https://www.spiritverse.academy/four-elements-transformation

 If you want to support this channel and its future, please contribute here: https://www.patreon.com/spiritverse

snippet.title: The Principles of Healing Disease
snippet.description:
Our latest book, Tao Te Ching: The Virtual Way is now available. Use this link to learn more and grab a copy: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/tao-te-ching

The subject of ‚Äòhealing‚Äô is a huge conversation, with a very deep and wide range of modalities. From east to west, the kind of medicine which is considered ‚Äòtraditional‚Äô varies greatly. In finding which works best, one must take into account how their illness came about in the first place, from every dimension of observation.

What emotions have we left unprocessed? What food and drink are we consuming; what is their nutritional content? Are we connected to the energetic blueprint of Spirit? All these factors play a part in our overall wellbeing, or the lack thereof.

In this episode of Spirit Science, we take a look at what makes (or breaks) one‚Äôs health, from the perspective of our multidimensional selves. We cannot fixate on only one ‚Äòmethod‚Äô to inspire healing, we must realize that health needs to be tackled from the perspectives of both body, mind, and spirit. 

The truth is, every form of medicine has its proper place. The more aware we are of the root causes of our illnesses and diseases, the easier time we will have in addressing them at their core, and guaranteeing success in our healing.

This episode was based on the book ‚ÄúScientific Healing Affirmations‚Äù, by Yogic Master Paramahansa Yogananda, and we highly encourage you checking it out if you want to go deeper into this subject.

snippet.description:
Hmm, in reflection upon posting I think I can make this video way better. I‚Äôll do a new version sometime soon, but for now please enjoy this first draft!

~~~

1. Truth is the Law, Love is the Law, Authenticity is the Law. May you hold these in your heart above all else, and live your life by them firmly. 

2. Honor your word and the Word of God. Your words are your creative power. You were made in the image of the Creator and the Word of God is the vibration of creation. Recognize the power of sacred scriptures and study them when you find them. Become learned in the wisdom teachings given to humanity that they may ascend; the holy scriptures of every sacred religion and the sciences of the day. Learn to identify and discern within your heart the difference between that which is True and that which is delusive, and always speak with Truth, Love, and Authenticity.  

3. Observe the unity in all things. There is no separation.

4. Take care of yourself, others, and nature.

5. Always clean up after yourself. 

6. Be kind and generous.

7. Be forgiving.

8. Listen first to understand and then speak to be understood. Do not speak when your words are empty and meaningless, lest you only waste everyone's time.
 
9. Explore your multidimensionality. Consciousness extends far beyond and deep within the body. It is through mind and spirit you may discover all that the cosmos has in store for you.

10. Have faith and trust that all can be redeemed and transformed. It is by inward devotion to the Divine and the willingness to listen and act upon the guidance received that this may come about. Personal sacrifice will be necessary along the path, which is a sacrifice of your time, effort, and energy as an offering of love and service towards the Supreme Ultimate Reality, that life may be better for all.

 If you want to support this channel and its future, please contribute here: https://www.patreon.com/SpiritScience

‚Äî‚Äî

Cover Image by WiPaLo the Artist!

snippet.description:
Grab your copy of the 2022 Almanac of the New Age today: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/almanac-2022

Life Gua chart: https://files.secure.website/wscfus/10545137/26489708/gua-or-kua-numbers-0001-w1920-o.jpg

Forget everything you know about Feng Shui- it's probably wrong! snippet.title: What the Heck is a Hunab-Ku?!
snippet.description:
The Ancient Mayans had a mysterious and fascinating culture about them. Their art, spirituality, and designs are especially interesting, and we find many parallells in teachings to other mystic traditions the world over.

This cosmic civilization has so much to teach us, and one of their many lessons is that of the Hunab Ku, a curious glyph which appears to be very similar to a yin-yang. In this video, let us explore it's symbolism, and see what wisdom we might glean from it.

snippet.title: Patchman's Magic Prosperity Affirmations
snippet.description:
Use these in meditation to shift your mindset and your reality into prosperity and abundance! 

When I talk to members of this beautiful Spirit community, I hear often that finances are the #1 issue in life. I have also been crashed by the waves of financial issues, which compelled me to learn more about money as energy.¬†

If money is energy and prosperity is consciousness, then a greater prosperity consciousness is the prerequisite to shift our relationship with money and help us live a prosperous life easily.¬†

And so I offer this meditation to you today as a tool that you can use freely to create more wealth in your life. If you listen to it every day, you will help your energy evolve over a spectrum of time. For me, I like to listen as i‚Äôm waking up in the morning. It will bring you into the day in a really vibrant way and help you to shift your energy towards prosperity consciousness. 

I‚Äôd like to challenge you to try it every day for one month, and see what you get as results by the end of it.¬†Share your experiences in the comments below, or in the Spirit Mysteries Sacred Community.

This meditation was created as a part of the Secret Language of Money, a course we offer in Spirit Mysteries. We‚Äôve designed 3 different courses now to help you shift your financial paradigm, (just in case you liked this and want more). 

You can learn more by visiting https://www.spiritmysteries.school, which is also the home of our online community. It‚Äôs free to join and we‚Äôd love to have you.

snippet.title: The Nature of the Soul... More Mystical Traditions
snippet.description:
In this Soul-series follow-up, we explore some less commonly discussed ideas on the nature of the soul, including indigenous and shamanic understandings. 

Perhaps the most significant correlation, which may help us all understand better, is that in nearly all cultures, the word Spirit means 'breath'. The breath of life, even biblically speaking, was that thing which became the animating principle in the first humans. By knowing our breath, we may know our life. 

~ ~ ~

At last - Spirit Science has a place where we can all come and master ourselves together! Come and check it out here: https://www.spiritverse.app

snippet.title: The Story of Spirit Science - Celebrating 10 Years
snippet.description:
Get access to the One-Day Spirit-Renewal Experience - https://www.spiritmysteries.com/Renewal2021

Also - if Rythmia calls to you, learn more here: https://rythmia.link/spirit

Believe it or not, yesterday was the 10 year anniversary of Spirit Science! It's amazing to think that over 10 years ago this whole thing began... and yet, here we are!

To celebrate our 10 year anniversary, I thought I would go live and share a bit about the backstory of Spirit Science, reflect on the adventure, talk about dreams to come, as well as invite you to come and watch our one-day Spirit renewal experience! https://www.spiritmysteries.com/Renewal2021

Peace and love!
Jordan, and all of us at Team Spirit

snippet.title: How Symbols Rule Our Minds
snippet.description:
There is a language hidden in plain sight, one which has been used since Homo Sapiens first left Africa... but few can read it properly. This is the language of symbols.

Every day we probably see hundreds of symbols, from letters to logos. Symbols can represent very large or very simple concepts, but what is not often known, is that at the heart of every symbol is an idea which plays out in our conscious and subconscious mind.


Looking for a place to connect with others on the path of truth, love, and authentic inner light? We just launched a School for Self Mastery! Check it out here: https://www.spiritmysteries.school

~~~

snippet.title: How to Deal with the Tree of Death
snippet.description:
Patch Tarot 3 is finally here! Thank you for joining us for this special event today üôè‚ú®üôå You can learn all about the new deck at our page right here: https://patchtarot.com/3 

Last week we published a new Spirit Science episode about the Tree of Death... But I wanted to take some more time to explore the subject and flesh out the concept. 

We have to recognize that the Tree of Death, just like the Tree of Life, should we choose to acknowledge it - would exist within us just as much as it's around us. If what the mystics all say is true, then as above, so below, as within, so without. 

Thus, if we can deal with and transform that which is within us, our relationship to the outside world can also transform.

Thus, the only demons are the ones in our own hearts - and that is where every battle must be fought. - Gandhi

Of course, all spiritual paths lead up the mountain of light, but one of the best ways i've found to do it (and fastest by far) is with sacred plant medicine in ceremony. And perhaps even more specifically, ceremony at Rythmia - because they do it RIGHT.

"Show me who I have become" - "merge me with my soul at all costs" - "heal my heart" - these are the stages of transformation, and it's the space Rythmia holds for all of their guests.

Truly, it's an honour to share them with you here, and if you are interested to learn more, use this link: https://rythmia.link/spirit

snippet.description:

Are you a fan of the classic novel "Little Women"? Did you know that there's a hidden spirituality behind the story that most people aren't aware of? In this video, we take a deep dive into the mystical elements of Louisa May Alcott's legendary masterpiece. Are you willing and able to receive? Find out by watching this through, and see what it means for you...

snippet.title: Could Disney's "Atlantis" Actually Be Real?
snippet.description:
Disney's "Atlantis" is a fascinating and often-overlooked movie that raises some interesting questions about history and mythology. Could the story of a lost civilization beneath the sea be based in reality? Join us as we explore the possible connections between the movie and real-life historical events and legends. From the ancient Greeks to modern-day theories about underwater cities, we'll dive deep into the mysteries of Atlantis and examine the evidence that supports the idea that this mythical place may have actually existed. So join us on this journey of discovery, and let's see if we can unravel the secrets of one of the most enduring legends of all time.

If you'd like to explore this concept (and many more) with a heart-centered community, come join Spiritverse: https://spiritverse.app/ and meet thousands of curious souls from around the world.

snippet.title: Secrets of Hollow Earth
snippet.description:
While it's often fictionalised in the media and movies, there are some curious theories about hollow earth, including some potential evidence for such a theory. Many ancients Buddhist texts reference the mythical Kingdom of Agartha, and countless cultures around the world have described ancient beings or gods as coming up from under the Earth and bringing knowledge and wisdom with them...

Ironically for being just a theory, this video was actually struck by YouTube for "Hate Speech"... so make of that what you will...

snippet.title: Is it Wrong to be Materialistic?
snippet.description:
We've all heard that old tale of how -in order to become enlightened, you have to detach yourself from the world and go full on hermit mode in a cave in the mountains... but what does enlightenment look like in the modern world?

If spiritual understanding comes from within... it has no bearing on your environment... so what's stopping you from becoming enlightened in the frozen yogurt isle at Target? Sure, it's easy to run away to the mountains and meditate because there's nothing to distract you there... but is that true discipline?

Countless spiritual systems seem to denounce materialism... but we must have our Ego and bodies for a reason... nothing happens by accident, so is it truly wrong to live a material life?

For a complete list of sources, visit: https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/is-it-wrong-to-be-materialistic-spirit-science-47

snippet.title: What's Faster than Light?
snippet.description:
Decades ago, breaking the sound barrier was a huge deal in transportation science... but many didn't think it could be done. What if the Light Barrier is the next big breakthrough in engineering?

Following the work of Steven Greer, there's a simple truth we have to acknowledge... in our universe, light is too damn slow. To get from one side of the Milky Way to the other it would take about 100,000 years even travelling at light speed... but countless reports of UFOs, ET's and unexplained phenomena implies these advanced civilisations have technology capable of going even faster...

Maybe even moving through different dimensions of reality or warping space itself... today we take a dive into SciFi and ask the question of what could be faster than light.

snippet.title: The Anunnaki Movie ~ The Mysterious Origins of Humanity
snippet.description:
Part 2 of the Sumerian Epic Saga shifts the focus from Nibiru, to the legendary "Anunnaki", which translates as "Sky Gods", and whom are said to play a significant role in the creation of our species. 

The Ancient Sumerian mythology stands both on its own as a wellspring of curiosities, but is also observed as an origin point for many biblical stories which we are all familiar today, where we even see a possible origin point for the story of Adam and Eve in the Garden of Eden. 

Could the "God" written of in Genesis actually be describing Anunnaki from an even older Sumerian Myth? 

Along with this, the Anunnaki Movie also shares exclusive interviews from Gaia's Ancient Civilizations, featuring both Gregg Braden and Graham Hancock. These incredible thought-leaders share groundbreaking discoveries which further add weight to the mysteries of the Anunnaki.

snippet.title: How Mystery Schools Changed the World...
snippet.description:
Thousands of years ago, Mystery Schools provided a form of spiritual community and teachings that existed across the emerging civilised world, from Egypt to Greece, and even spanning into India and Europe... 

The Mysteries brought so much to the world, from laying the foundation for modern math, chemistry, physics, and philosophy, and even facilitating the creation of the Olympic Games! While nearly 2000 years ago, the flame of the Mysteries was nearly extinguished, they have experienced many rebirths in the last thousand years... 

The mystic teachings spurred the Renaissance in Italy and facilitated a new wave of awareness towards even the most traditional and orthodox religions... Today, the Mysteries are once again experiencing a rebirth, and for those who are seeking a space for true, deep spiritual transformation, a new platform shines light through the veil of the night, bringing us all together to ground this transformation into the world.

snippet.title: From Teen to Master: The Evolution of Spiritual Growth in "Avatar: The Last Airbender"
snippet.description:
"Avatar: The Last Airbender" captured our hearts with its charming characters, thrilling action, and deeper spiritual themes. But have you ever wondered why it's always a young teenager who has to save the world with little-to-no help from their parents? In the second part of our "Hidden Spirituality" series on "Avatar: The Last Airbender," we explore the nature of spiritual mastery, maturity, and evolution.

Join us as we dive deeper into the spiritual themes of "Avatar: The Last Airbender" and explore the journey of Aang and his friends as they seek to master the elements and save the world from destruction. We'll examine the role of age and experience in spiritual growth, and explore the importance of maturity and evolution in the journey towards enlightenment. Don't miss this fascinating exploration of one of the most beloved animated series of all time.

Sometimes, the biggest struggles we have come from not having the right support system to help us navigate the ups and downs of life. Come and join our sacred community and connect with likeminded souls from around the world: https://spiritverse.app/

snippet.title: Near-Death Experiences
snippet.description:
Imagine you're on the operating table... you close your eyes and all of a sudden hear what sounds like a singing bowl and feel a great wave of vibration. The next thing you know you're up and about, looking back at your body and floating through different dimensions, meeting beings familiar and strange. 

Welcome to the world of NDE's.

Near-Death Experiences are very unique; permeating across cultures, religions, and social barriers across human history for generations. In such cases, they most often compel life-changing realizations in those who experience them.

snippet.title: The Mind-Blowing Spiritual Revelations of "The Rise of Skywalker"
snippet.description:
May the fourth be with you!  Are you ready to pick up your lightsaber and find inner harmony between the light and dark within? Discover the Four Elements Transformation, available at any price you'd like: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/four-elements

Get ready for a special Star Wars Day treat! In this video, we take a deeper look into the Rise of Skywalker and uncover the hidden spiritual secrets that are intertwined within the story.

While the trilogy may lack a cohesive plot, there is no shortage of spiritual symbolism and wisdom to be found in the world of Star Wars. Join us as we explore the meaning behind the name Jedi and its connection to the ancient magician Djedi, as well as the concept of the Force and its ties to the ancient Chinese philosophy of Taoism. We'll delve into the spiritual journey of Rey and Kylo Ren, and how their paths lead to a climactic battle between good and evil. So grab your lightsaber and join us for an enlightening exploration of the Rise of Skywalker through a spiritual lens! May the Force be with you.

snippet.title: "Fellowship of the Ring" and the Quest for Truth
snippet.description:
Looking for a spiritual fellowship of your own? Come join the Spiritverse community: https://spiritverse.app/

Join us on an epic journey as we delve into the hidden spiritual meanings and messages found within the Fellowship of the Ring. Written almost 100 years ago, this classic tale still resonates with audiences today, teaching us valuable lessons on creating real change in the world, overcoming our limitations, and releasing our attachments to greed and power. In this video, we explore the deeper spiritual themes present in the first arc of the story, uncovering the wisdom behind the journey of Frodo and the Fellowship as they embark on a quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat the evil that threatens Middle-earth. We'll discover the symbolism behind the characters and their struggles, and how their journey reflects the universal human experience of facing adversity and overcoming it with courage, compassion, and hope. So come along with us on this adventure, and let's unlock the hidden spirituality of Fellowship of the Ring together!

snippet.title: The Spiritual Roots of Science
snippet.description:
At the heart of Western society lies a foundation in the scientific method... the belief that an objective and testable reality exists. But it's no secret that some of the greatest minds in scientific history also acknowledged a debt of gratitude to spiritual philosophies...

From Einstein claiming Spinoza's Pantheism was in line with his idea of God, to Newton translating the Emerald Tablet of Hermes... spirituality and science have more in common than any two fields in history, we just need to think with a little perspective!

Sources:

The Principia: Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy. Translated by Cohen, I. Bernard; Whitman, Anne; Budenz, Julia: Isaac Newton: 1726

https://www.academia.edu/7072076/The_Influence_of_Renaissance_Hermeticism_on_the_Scientific_Revolution

The Hermetica: Wisdom of the Pharaohs. Timothy Freke & Peter Gandy 

https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2018/04/harvard-researchers-study-how-mindfulness-may-change-the-brain-in-depressed-patients/

https://www.nytimes.com/1997/07/22/science/far-apart-2-particles-respond-faster-than-light.html

https://youtu.be/wFT7hrktm-A

Magris, Aldo (2005), "Gnosticism: Gnosticism from its origins to the Middle Ages (further considerations)", in Jones, Lindsay (ed.), MacMillan Encyclopedia of Religion, MacMillan

snippet.title: The Surprising Spiritual Lessons of "The Perks of Being a Wallflower"
snippet.description:
Looking for a place to connect with others on the path of truth, love, and authentic inner light? Come join the community and let's evolve our consciousness together: https://www.spiritverse.app/

Join us as we explore the timeless message of 'The Perks of Being a Wallflower', a story about the journey to self-discovery and the power of connection. 

Through the eyes of Charlie, a high school student struggling to find his place in the world, we learn about the infinite layers of the human psyche and the importance of embracing our uniqueness. Despite being set in the early '90s, this coming-of-age tale is relevant to people of all ages and backgrounds, reminding us that we are more alike than we are different. Through the characters' experiences, we gain insights into our own lives and the people around us, discovering the joys of higher awareness and seeing the true selves of others. So grab your headphones, put on your favorite mix-tape, and join us on a journey of self-discovery with "The Perks of Being a Wallflower".

snippet.title: Healing With Food: The Movie!
snippet.description:
The times we are living in are of no comparison to anything most of us can compare in our memory or recent history. It is more important than ever that we take the time to prepare our bodies and minds to rise in awareness. We are only just beginning to understand the living nature of reality, and rising into a higher dimension of being. 

Knowing the nature of food, we can use it to become healthy and powerful, or weak and stiff... It is up to us to choose. In this documentary, we explore all of the ways that food can heal or harm us; may it support all who wish to evolve their relationship with food. 

This film is not intended to replace medical advice. 

IMPORTANT NOTE* It seems as though 2 small errors in this video.

1) The human body does produce B12 under certain circumstances but cannot be relied upon, especially in general western cultures with the types of foods that we eat. 

2) Spirulina does not contain B12 in the same way that we thought - it contains an imitation B12, similar but not quite the same.

Thank you to our amazing audience for helping to point this out. We are reviewing these items to see if we should edit and re-upload the video.

~ ~ ~

This film features clips from:
Forks over Knives
Vegucated
Food Inc

And for a complete list of sources ~ https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/healing-your-body-with-food-the-complete-movie

Discover the power of connection and community with Spiritverse - our online haven for the evolution of consciousness. Click here to gain access now: https://www.spiritverse.app/

As lovers and players of Final Fantasy ourselves, this episode is an homage to the precious, imaginative moments of childhood...

What at first seems like a regular "fantasy" experience becomes completely transformed when you understand the deeper mystical meaning behind each symbol and character. Final Fantasy 7 is rich with insight, if only we choose to dig deep... and have fun while doing so!

Comment below if you played this game, and how this episode changed or empowered your thoughts on it üëáüèº

üíõ P.S. A personal note from Jordan River, Creator of Spirit Science:

This video is a bit of a love letter to my childhood. I grew up with Final Fantasy in my heart, and with the launch of the FF7 remake - it seemed only fitting we make an episode of Hidden Spirituality dedicated to this powerful and deeply moving gaming experience. Within the game itself lay mysteries far deeper than most people know... Thank you for witnessing it with us.

Also - @Antistius made a remarkable comment, pointing out the connection that Tifa and Aerith together make Tiphareth. Truly - I was STUNNED! What an amazing revelation, thank you Antistius! 

The site I found the relationship of Aerith to Chesed is linked below. It seems the Mysteries are never-ending on this one!

snippet.title: Smashing the Money Myths
snippet.description:
Take control of your finances today‚Äîsign up for the challenge and pay what feels right! https://www.spiritverse.academy/the-money-mindset-challenge

There's a lot of things we've been taught about money, and a lot of those things aren't true! Today, we smash the money myths once and for all, and reveal a hidden truth about the nature of money! In doing so, we may even learn something new about ourselves...

UPDATE: I'd like to clarify that yes - in the bible, it says "The love of money" not just "Money is the root of all evil", which I did not specify in this video. The difference is important, however, it's just as important to know that this is where that core belief comes from and that we must smash both of these money myths. To be clear - I am not suggesting we worship money, but to understand it for what it is, and use it where appropriate and responsibly to make life better for everyone. 

This video was created by Team Spirit
Written and produced by Jordan River.
Art and animations by Nikola Weryk, Ariel Carpenter, and Jordan River
Inspiration is drawn from "FU Money" by Dan Lok

snippet.title: The Creation of Humanity ~ The Sumerian Epic (Part 5)
snippet.description:
Ancient mythology tells us of humanity‚Äôs first steps upon an abundant landscape. However, a careful study of our ancient texts reveals a different perspective of this pristine paradise. Click here to stream Ancient Civilizations now! http://bit.ly/StreamAncientCivilizations 

The Sumerian Epic continues with specific details on mankind's creation. The tablets tell us that the Sumerian god Enki, along with his wife Ninhursag (also Damkina/Ninmah), created humanity. They did this by mixing ‚Äúdivine blood‚Äù with the ‚Äúclay of the earth.‚Äù This shows the paradoxical duality of mankind's nature, being both earth-born and heaven-born at the same time, a fusion of the two.

Yet, fanciful metaphors aside... How exactly did this happen, and did it happen for real? Is there any evidence to support that this event actually took place in our ancient past? 

Throughout this exciting chapter, discover the ancient African ruins that are thought today by some to be the remnants of gold mines, along with anomalies our own genetic history that supports this incredible theory!

snippet.title: The Nibiru Movie ~ The Secret Origins of our World
snippet.description:
Ready to change your life in just a week? The Seven-Day Transformation is here for you. https://www.spiritverse.academy/seven-day-transformation

The film opens the discussions and questions regarding the mysterious yet popular ‚Äúconspiracy theory‚Äù of Nibiru, the supposed hidden planet that lurks in the farthest reaches of our outer solar system. 

It was nearly 50 years ago that the Nibiru Mystery first reached the world through time and space. It was in Zechariah Sitchin‚Äôs first book ‚ÄúThe Twelfth Planet‚Äù, which put forth the idea that the oldest texts on the planet, the Cuneiform tablets of Sumer, encoded legends which describe the creation of our solar system, and ourselves.

snippet.title: Spirit Science ~ Happy New Year 2019 (Again!)
snippet.description:
Start your journey to wellness with the free Healing the Body Worksheet today. https://www.spiritverse.academy/healing-worksheet

Wait for a second. Haven't we done this already? Hmm, it seems we did! So, the last New Year's video had to be taken down only a day after publication. But instead of just re-uploading a slightly different version, we felt it would be best to take the opportunity to actually discuss many of the things we've been wanting to open up and share. Enjoy!

Replace your Netflix account with Gaia!
https://gaia.com/spiritscience

~ ~ 

Spirit Science has changed so much over the years, and so much has happened behind the scenes that affected its evolution. When the first New Year video came down, I really felt like it was some karma telling me I needed to take the time to make the video that I've been wanting to make for a while, and the script for this one just poured out of me.

Despite this, there's still so much to discuss, but this feels like an excellent "first step". The main focus here is the studio... It's been a long road with Spirit Science, and one of the most significant changes has been shifting from going at it willy-nilly to stepping up to a more professional level, starting a studio, and being legit. This also means that Spirit Science has to take monetization seriously for us to bring in a team of animators and make stuff at a higher and higher level.

When Spirit Science first started, I lived in my parents' basement. For a long time, I traveled around and stayed with people who invited me to live with them, but none of these options were really a solid "root" for me to live from, which is one of the reasons that Spirit Science has struggled. 

In 2016, I planted a seed of a Studio and, at the tail end of 2016, hired my friend Aaron to help me make the studio properly. We've come a long way, but we have a long way to go still. If you're interested, you can pause and read the company's Mission/Vision statement in this video to see what we're really all about.

Thanks for reading! Love you eternally

snippet.description:

snippet.title: How Big-Agro Destroyed the Planet | Spirit Science
snippet.description:
Discover holistic healing techniques with our free Healing the Body Worksheet. https://www.spiritverse.academy/healing-worksheet

Welcome back to Spirit Science! Today we get our hands dirty as we investigate the plant agricultural systems of our modern world, and discover what is happening beneath our feet around the world. 

Because of the way we have constructed our lives as a species when investigating industrial plant-based agriculture, we have found that the system is in the same kind of trouble as it is with the other industries that we‚Äôve looked at previously. 

The issues surrounding plant-based agriculture are slightly different, but don‚Äôt let that fool you. They are just as dangerous as any other of the heavily commercialized industrial practices are on our health. Although there seem to be fewer diseases related to consuming mass-produced plants they are still responsible for major health issues due to modern chemical agriculture, genetic modification, and low nutrient quality. 

When we found out that the most traditionally nourishing plant foods on the planet now have the lowest levels of nutrients within them than they ever have, we just had to find out why! One of the things we found out is that it all comes down to the dirt. 

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%2033_9%20The%20Dirt%20on%20Agriculture

snippet.title: Spirit Science 2 ~ Chakras
snippet.description:
Discover holistic healing techniques with our FREE Healing the Body Worksheet. https://www.spiritverse.academy/healing-worksheet

Chakras are a reflection of the patterns present in the universe, permeating through all aspects of reality. These seven energy centers are found in the frequencies of music, colors, and senses, which include thoughts and emotions. The number seven is regarded as sacred, as it is mentioned in the Bible, where Joshua and Israel marched seven times around Jericho, accompanied by seven priests blowing seven trumpets, before the walls collapsed.

When we learn about chakras, we can experience the same movement within ourselves. The most common system is the seven basic chakras, each with its unique function such as survival, sex, willpower, and love. However, other systems, like the 13 chakra system, also exist. Each chakra is associated with a Sanskrit name and influences specific practical aspects of our life.

Chakras are non-physical, energetic openings on our body that impact our physical, emotional, and spiritual well-being. Through chakra healing, we can unleash our inner power, transform our lives, and activate our energy centers to achieve true bliss. Understanding the science behind chakras can help us unlock our full potential and experience their many benefits.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/spirit-science-2-chakras

snippet.title: The Miracle of Fasting (Heal Your Body With Water!)
snippet.description:
Empower your body‚Äôs natural healing process with this free essential worksheet. https://www.spiritverse.academy/healing-worksheet

In this episode, we continue our exploration into health and nutrition by discovering what could very well be one of the greatest healing abilities that we have available to us‚Äîfasting. Fasting has been described as a miracle cure by countless generations before us due to its inexplicable nature to rapidly detox the body and put us into a state of rapid rejuvenation. 

In addition to this, fasting is also a powerful spiritual practice that has been used as a technique across many spiritualities for thousands of years and is said to connect us with God regardless of faith. 

There are many different types of fasts, whether it be water fasting, juice fasting, intermittent fasting, or dry fasting. Other fasts that combine these together have been invented more recently, such as ‚Äòthe master fast cleanse‚Äô. In this video, we look at all of them and explore their value and benefits.

snippet.title: Spirit Science: The Untold History of Tarot
snippet.description:
The cards featured in this episode are Patch Tarot, our custom Tarot which unites the two primary Tarot decks used today, the Rider Waite and Thoth Tarot. Click here to learn more and order a copy: https://www.spiritmysteries.com/discover-patch-tarot

Tarot is very much a mystery even in the world today, for even its origins are somewhat elusive at best. While it may appear at first that the cards emerged as a game in the 13th century, their archetypes, numerology, and other symbolic connections draw many paralells with ancient Egyptian and Hebrew mysticism. 

With that said, regardless of it's origins; the history of Tarot a colorful and intricate story and language which we may come to see in our day to day lives, and over generations in society. In this, one finds that Tarot is a versatile system of ancient and esoteric knowledge. 

Today, the Rider-Waite-Smith and Thoth Tarot have become two foundational decks upon which most are based. This is even true in Patch Tarot, where the two systems have been harmoniously fused together. 

Tom Tadford Little website ~
http://web.archive.org/web/20080716033756/http://www.tarothermit.com/

Music by John Hand & TerraTonz

snippet.title: Spirit Science: The Essence of Tarot
snippet.description:
Experience the next evolution of Tarot with Patch Tarot 3‚Äîyour journey to deeper wisdom begins here! https://www.patchtarot.com/3

Tarot is a subject which deals in fundamental archetypes, which may be observed and interpreted to be underlying both the human experience and the natural world. When one takes the time to consider and contemplate the Tarot system, they begin to comprehend what might be called 'the body of consciousness', and know themselves to a greater degree. 

The purpose of the Tarot is multifold and can be used for very enlightening or mundane purposes. Familiarizing with such patterns supports the conscious mind in being more aware of what the heart feels and what guidance comes from Spirit. Thus, proper use of the Tarot is an avenue by which we may reflect upon all that transpires in one's life and a supportive instrument in making choices based on deeper consideration.

snippet.title: The Tree of Life and the Ten Sephiroth
snippet.description:
Transform your Tarot readings with Patch Tarot 3, designed to inspire and illuminate. https://www.patchtarot.com/3

In traditional Kabbalah, a concept was introduced called the 10 Sephiroth, which are the 10 spheres that make up the Tree. These spheres are considered emanations that God uses to manifest reality. 

We might think of these as 'outpourings of cosmic energy and structure', which continually become more intricate and condensed until finally they manifest from formlessness and into form. In this episode, we take a deeper look at them all.

For the video description and sources, check out our website ~

snippet.title: Qabalah and the Tree of Life
snippet.description:
Enter the world of Qabbalah and the Tree of Life. Together, these are names for a map and model of understanding life's spiritual, physical, and metaphysical aspects. This model, which combines a fusion of traditional Kabbalah with Hermeticism and other mystic teachings, is known by the spelling "Qabalah". The Tree of Life, on the other hand, is a cosmic glyph said to describe everything in creation. Together, they describe how the universe comes into being, the structure of our essential being, and how to live naturally with all of creation. 

Patch Tarot 3 has arrived‚Äîembrace the next chapter of your Tarot journey today! https://www.patchtarot.com/3

Qabalah is a philosophy and science which uses the Tree of Life to explain the nature of creation. While this is a massive rabbit hole in-and-of itself, this episode begins to open up the conversation on the subject. Enjoy! üôèüíõ‚ú®

snippet.description:

We first started harvesting milk about 7500 years ago in different parts of Europe. Many theorists guess that this may have been due to a lack of vitamin D in an area of the world with long periods without sunlight. 

Since then, the industry has grown to include all forms of dairy products and has become a staple in our modern diets. Despite this, we are the only species that drink milk after birth, and from another animal no less. All other animals drink their mother‚Äôs milk until they are grown enough.

snippet.title: The History of Psychedelics! üçÑ
snippet.description:
Begin your path to health and vitality with the Healing the Body Worksheet now! https://www.spiritverse.academy/healing-worksheet

The first recorded use of psychedelics is nearly impossible to find because it stretches back to before even the written word was first carved. 

One of the great pioneers of psychedelics for our world, Terence Mckenna, has suggested that humanity even evolved thanks to psychedelics, and without them we wouldn't be who we are today. 

Looking into ancient history, we see many ancient cave drawings depicting what appears to be humanoids with geometric waves shooting out of their heads, and even people with mushroom heads.

Seeing thus that throughout history, psychedelics are prevalent... what can they teach us today, as we learn to honour their value.  

This episode explores an overview of the history of psychedelics, and was made as a part of a team project with Collective Evolution. Watch their full documentary here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3Qr94E6NpI

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%2032%20A%20Brief%20History%20of%20Psychedelics

snippet.description:
Religion and mythology tell us of humanity‚Äôs first steps upon an abundant landscape. A careful study of our ancient texts, however, reveals a different perspective of this pristine paradise. In this inaugural episode of Ancient Civilizations, explore the Garden of Eden with scholars who go beyond accepted history and mythology to reveal a lost story of the birth of humanity. http://bit.ly/PatchmanBackInTime

Although the mainstream scientific world would have us believe that people are losing their belief in God and religion is downswing, the truth is is that presently, the percentage of the world's population that is actually Atheist is actually very small, with almost half of the world‚Äôs population following either Islam or Christianity, and smaller denominations Eastern Spiritualities from there, and then indigenous faiths continuing from there.

The more we research, study, and learn, the more we find that there are many common strains among all religions and faiths, and in fact, almost all of them share many common interconnected points. You know the idea that a subtle flitter of a butterfly's wing can be the catalyst for creating a hurricane or a tornado on the other side of the planet? This applies to everything, and Mars retrograde is no exception. The smallest shift, the change in the gravitational relationship with Mars, created much larger results with many smaller shifts and events that played out here on Earth.

Mars and Saturn retrograde, as all retrogrades go, are times for reflection and observation of the way that we act and behave with each other, and cultivating the striving forward motion that feels so good when we are inflow. 

For Mars, it's more about the emotional side of our male energy. For Saturn, its more about the order and structure of the way we operate inside our world.

snippet.title: Spirit Science 10 ~ The Math of God
snippet.description:
Over 2000 years ago, the Pythagoreans believed the universe was made up of numbers and proportions, prizing geometry as a sacred art akin to understanding God itself.

The golden ratio is a perfect, infinite ratio that can be found everywhere in nature, from flowers to animals and even within our very bodies. This perfect ratio was even imbued in ancient buildings because its significance was understood. The more it is studied, the more we find that it may truly is found everywhere. 

The more we understand where reality comes from, the deeper we probe into our metaphysical selves and learn who and what we truly are.

snippet.title: Cycles N' Sine Waves: Discover the Cosmic Patterns! | Spirit Science
snippet.description:
Embark on a transformative journey through the Major Arcana and enhance your spiritual awareness. https://www.spiritverse.academy/major-arcana-challenge

Cycles occur naturally in nature, like the rising and setting of the sun, the cycle of the seasons, and the blooming and dying of a flower, all of which repeat themselves forever. Then we have our own man-made cycles, like time, daily routines, the economy, and the creation and destruction of new and old inventions.

A cycle looks like an ebb and flow, back and forth, yin and yang. It‚Äôs not a loop simply going in a circle, but rather the shape of an infinity sign. It is a never-ending flow that, when we are in alignment with, can create the most harmonious experiences for us that we can use for the highest good!

snippet.title: Clarity on Spirit Science
snippet.description:
There have been a lot of questions recently about Spirit Science and its evolution. What are we up to, and where are we going? Some people had also made up some ideas about Spirit Science becoming Cult-Like and a new Religion, which I thought was ridiculous. 

We both apologize for any confusion that we may have, and we thank you, loving beings, for staying loving and kind no matter what video is posted. As for everyone who has been so mean and nasty recently, perhaps this video can help clear up some things about how you have been feeling. Perhaps this can also be a reminder not to be so mean. It doesn't serve anyone, especially yourself. 

We're new to this whole "travel the world, make fun videos, shift the planet" thing as well, so we ask that you be patient with us. It gets hard to manage 50 emails a day, constantly asking for spiritual guidance.

Keep asking questions, make decisions for yourself, and move forward into the light! 
Create what you want to create, and trust yourself above all else! (Your true self!) 

I love you! Have a Happy New Year!!
~Patchman

snippet.title: Give Thanks!
snippet.description:
Hey Everyone! This is a music video I cut together for everyone for Thanksgiving and beyond! The song is "Give Thanks" by Elijah & The Band of Light, one of my biggest inspirations. I love this man. If you know him, tell him I love him and want to give him a hug!

His music is also available on Bandcamp! 
http://elijahandthebandoflight.bandcamp.com/album/ray-one-ep
http://elijahandthebandoflight.bandcamp.com

Regardless of what this day means for you, we all must learn and practice giving thanks and love to those in our lives. The connections between each other is so meaningful, this is as much a collective journey as much as it is a solo one. And to try and help shift this planet solo is ultimately to cut yourself off from the rest. 

The One is All.
The All is One. 

Have a beautiful day, every single day.

snippet.title: Water and the Spirit of Life | Spirit Science
snippet.description:
Water is one of the most essential ingredients for life, found in abundance in all living things. This understanding of water goes beyond just a fundamental necessity and into a spiritual knowing of water's true nature. There is a reason that water is so often spoken of in the Tao Te Ching, where Lao Tzu relates the Spirit itself to being like water. 

In this episode of Spirit Science, we also focus on the work of Dr. Masaru Emoto, who first pioneered discovering hidden messages in water by exposing it to different emotions, vibrations, and frequencies. His work has been foundational in the field of consciousness and demonstrates a powerful link between human thought and how reality manifests. 

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~

snippet.title: An Experiment in Expression
snippet.description:
Money and Spirituality DO go together! Come and discover how you can transform your spiritual financial paradigm today üîÆ https://www.spiritmysteries.com/SMM 

Check out Elijah Ray's amazing music on Spotify! ~ https://open.spotify.com/artist/06vQrpQw4sEnbGHnVbCghf

This week, I would like to take some time to talk about Words. Words are very fascinating, because some Words have an intrinsic meaning that goes along with the vibration, and other words have no meaning, but we give them meaning based on how we use them. 

I have learned to strive to understand what all vibrations are and ask questions as to why these words are expressed in the way that they are. Words like Spirit, Holographic Universe, and God are all words that are incredibly misunderstood in our day and age, and to look at the Root of the word will yield a deeper understanding of why we use the word as we do.

The Expression of the Universe manifests as you, and the All of Infinity. You and I are an expression of the Source Consciousness Field, and we can express ourselves in any way that we choose. At least, that is what I have come to in my growth, and it is a truth that I would like to share with you. Whether you receive it or not, that's up to you. 

As usual, take what resonates and leave the rest behind, you get to decide.

Check these movies out: 
Thrive

snippet.title: A Message of Unity
snippet.description:
As we continue Spirit Science and the Exploration into the ALL and the ONE, we must realize that LOVE is the balance in which all exist in harmony and peace. We can strive to be in this space by accessing the source known as Christ Consciousness in the Sacred Space of your Heart, and when in tune with this place, we can know only Unconditional Love with everyone and everything.
 
It matters not who you are, what walk of life you emerge from, where you are going, or what you want. We must learn to come together regardless of our differences, regardless of the things that we see as separation, and see ourselves as what we really are. A collective species on ONE planet, in ONE Solar System, Galaxy, and Universe. There is no Separation except that which exists in our minds.

And the best part about Unconditional Love ~ It's ALL Encompassing.

snippet.title: The Language of the Four Elements | Spirit Science
snippet.description:
The four elements are found in all creation systems and throughout reality. This is because number unfolds from one, or unity, into the multiplicity of creation. Such an unfolding is described in the Tao Te Ching, which essentially purports that the One begat Two, the Two begat Three, which begat Four, and from these came the myriad of all things.

The four elements are commonly understood as Earth, Fire, Water, and Air, and such a system can be seen throughout the natural world. We have the four elements, the four states of matter, the four seasons, the four directions, the four forces of nature, and so on. 

By studying the four elements, one comes to know and identify the various meanings of interpretation, depending on which lens we observe. Throughout this episode, let us explore how sacred geometry manifests and see them united and whole within ourselves.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%2018%20The%20Four%20Elements

snippet.title: Spirit Science 3 ~ Channeling
snippet.description:
Transform your mind, body, and spirit with the wisdom of the four elements. https://www.spiritverse.academy/four-elements-transformation

In this episode of Spirit Science, we delve into channeling, a widely prevalent phenomenon that involves perceiving information beyond our physical selves. The word "channel" originates from a term that means "that by which something passes or is transmitted," thus, channeling refers to a process of inviting the Divine Intelligence to become more alive and present within us.

Contrary to popular belief, channeling does not necessarily involve a person sitting down and having spirits talk through them. Instead, it can manifest in various forms, such as the sensation of electricity rushing through us during moments of creative inspiration. When we understand channeling correctly, it can serve as a useful resource for understanding who we are and our place in the cosmos.

Some may believe that channeling is a way of opening oneself up to demons, which is a possibility. Still, the benefits of channeling, such as connecting with higher dimensions, tapping into the power of the universe, and discovering our true purpose in life, cannot be overlooked. Join us as we explore the truth about channeling and dispel any myths surrounding this fascinating phenomenon.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%203%20Channeling

snippet.title: The Parable of the Two Monks & The Parable of the Water Pot ~ Patch Parables 6
snippet.description:
Take the first step to a new you‚Äîjoin the Seven-Day Transformation today! https://www.spiritverse.academy/seven-day-transformation

This particular episode is a two-parter!

The first is the Parable of two monks crossing a great river on their journey. Along their way, they encounter a paradox between their sacred customs and the need to do the right thing. May this parable help you find the Truth underneath the paradox itself and use it in your life... 

In the second parable, we see an elderly woman who carries two pots on her shoulders as she walks to and from the river every day, but one is cracked. Through the heartfelt story, we learn that something we might see as damaged or bad is actually a blessing in disguise.

snippet.title: The Spirit Science Crystal Movie
snippet.description:
Discover the next steps in human evolution with this transformative course! https://www.spiritverse.academy/evolution-of-humanity

To understand the nature of crystals, it‚Äôs essential to realize that everything is fundamentally a part of one great field of energy, vibrating together in a tremendous unified quantum field. 

To understand this better, Fritjof Capra explains this in the Tao of Physics:

‚ÄúQuantum Theory reveals a basic oneness of the universe. It shows we cannot decompose the world into independently existing smallest units. As we penetrate into matter, nature does not show us any isolated ‚Äòbasic building blocks‚Äô; rather, it appears as a complicated web of relations between the various parts of the whole. These relations always include the observer essentially. [...] In atomic physics, we can never speak about nature without, at the same time, speaking about ourselves.‚Äù

Knowing this, we may learn to see everything as a part of ourselves. Thus, crystals are seen as expressions of creation that mirror the same sacred geometric patterns by which we are created. Thus, they seem to be conductors and transmitters of energy. Each crystal has its own geometric lattice and, thus, its own particular radiant energy. 

In our exploration with crystals, we would do well to not grow attached to them or believe they are 'the ultimate solution' to our problems. However, just as adding spices to food adds flavors, adding crystals to our spaces and adorning them on our bodies may add a subtle frequency to our field, elevating our mind, body, and soul's connection with God.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~ https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/crystal-movie

snippet.title: Spirit Science 12 ~ The Human History Movie
snippet.description:
Experience the next evolution of Tarot with Patch Tarot 3‚Äîyour journey to deeper wisdom begins here! https://www.patchtarot.com/3

What if our history was not what we thought? 

This unique telling of our history explores a story that puts all of the pieces together from the mysteries explored in this first season of Spirit Science. It weaves together the mysterious advances of the Ancient Greeks and Egyptians, the precession of the equinox, and the understanding of dimensions. 

What emerges is a story that one will never forget!

If this story is true, it would seem that all of humanity's struggles today are not coincidental or random but a direct result of events that took place many thousand years ago. This story explains all of these mysteries. 

The Spirit Science Human History Movie is often one of the first episodes ever seen by those on the awakening journey. It's an honour to share this season finale with you now. üôè

snippet.title: The Parable of the Sandcastles ~ Patch Parables 1
snippet.description:
This first ever parable begins by sharing a message the transient nature of reality. 

Through life, we grow up often caring deeply about our possessions, even becoming very careful to build up that which is ours, and not let go. Yet, once our time here is complete, we pass away and leave it all behind. 

In the end, it would seem that the material objects don‚Äôt matter so much any longer, and what really counted was the experiences and connections we made; the relationships we have with ourselves, each other, and God. Let us all remember to practice living authentically, beyond just what we physically see and earn.

snippet.title: Spirit Science 8 ~ Meditation
snippet.description:
Dive deep into the ancient wisdom of the Emerald Tablets of Thoth and unlock the secrets of the universe. https://www.spiritverse.academy/emerald-tablets

Meditation may be one of the first spiritual techniques we learn and one of the most valuable. By calming our thoughts, meditation can help us become centered and balanced and experience a sense of wholeness. 

The word "meditation" comes from the Proto-Indo-European root meaning "contemplation; devout preoccupation; private devotions, prayer." This root is derived from the Proto-Indo-European root  meaning "take appropriate measures." Through this understanding, we may see that Meditation is the process of using timely foresight to appropriately handle our issues before they begin by going within and finding our center.

This episode explores the importance of incorporating meditation into one's life and how it affects us in every dimension of our being.

For the full video description and sources, check out our website ~
https://www.spiritsciencecentral.com/blog/Spirit%20Science%208%20Meditation

snippet.title: Spirit Science 5 ~ The Keys of our Past
snippet.description:
Achieve elemental harmony and transform your life with our Four Elements course. https://www.spiritverse.academy/four-elements-transformation

In this special episode of Spirit Science, explore the mysteries of human history and uncover three distinct keys that may reveal our true origins; the precession of the equinox, the age of the sphinx, and the dogon mystery. By delving into these mysteries, we challenge the current understanding of human origins and consider alternative possibilities.

We each need to ask these important questions; why are these massive Earth changes happening right now? Why didn‚Äôt it happen 100 years ago? 20 years ago? Or in 200 years from now? It would seem that we are on the cusp of a great evolution for our species, one which will forever change our understanding of who we are.

snippet.title: Spirit Science 4 ~ Masculine and Feminine Energy
snippet.description:
Master your inner reality with the Seven-Day Transformation! Learn more here: https://www.spiritverse.academy/seven-day-transformation

In this episode of Spirit Science, we explore the concept of Masculine and Feminine Energy and how they manifest in various aspects of our lives, such as physically, emotionally, mentally, and spiritually. Despite being polarizing energies, both Masculine and Feminine Energy exist in all of us and are essential to creating the multiplicity of creation.

However, the manifestation of these energies is not restricted to the physical bodies of males and females. Instead, Masculine and Feminine Energy refer to the polarizing energy that moves through us, and it is the degree to which they manifest together that determines the outcome.

Join us as we delve into the secrets of Masculine and Feminine Energy, discovering how to harness their power within, find balance, and unlock our true potential. With this knowledge, we can heal our inner Masculine and Feminine, transform our lives, and embrace our divine nature.
